accordion_sections.title: Description
accordion_sections.body: Emerald wrap silhouette, double-lined satin, adjustable cloud-tie waist.

accordion_sections.title: Size Guide
accordion_sections.body: Runs true to size. Between sizes? size down for a sculpted waist. Length hits mid-thigh on 5’6”.

accordion_sections.title: Shipping
accordion_sections.body: Ships within 24h from LA + EU hubs. Express upgrade available at checkout.

accordion_sections.title: Returns
accordion_sections.body: 30-day exchanges on unworn items. Instant store credit issued on scan.

accordion_sections.title: Care
accordion_sections.body: Cold delicate wash in mesh bag or steam refresh. Lay flat to dry to protect sheen.
